title: Dauntless
description: A free-to-play, co-op action RPG with gameplay similar to Monster Hunter.

title: World of Tanks
description: If you like blowing up tanks, with a quick and intense game style you will love this game!

title: Warframe
description: A cooperative free-to-play third person online action shooter set in an stunning sci-fi world.

title: CRSED: F.O.A.D.
description: Take the battle royale genre and add  mystical powers and you have CRSED: F.O.A.D. (Aka Cuisine Royale: Second Edition)

title: Crossout
description: A post-apocalyptic MMO vehicle combat game!

title: Blade and Soul
description: A free-to-play martial arts MMORPG that tasks players with learning combination attacks.

title: Armored Warfare
description: A modern team-based MMO tank game from Obsidian Entertainment.

title: Trove
description: A free to play Sandbox massively multiplayer online role-playing game!

title: ArcheAge
description: A free-to-play, hybrid fantasy/sandbox MMORPG brought to you by Trion Worlds.
